content: getting your hands on a real turkey leg might actually be more difficult than making this crocheted version crochet a full sized version using 2 strands of worsted weight yarn or opt for a single-stranded version to better fit the smaller hands of your favorite tiny chef each drumstick is made in one piece with only a small amount of sewing required to complete the shaping of the bone and and close up your project i m making it my personal mission to be more involved in my community going forward when a local children s advocacy center put out a call for crocheters to donate crocheted turkey legs for their 2024 turkey trot i knew it was a perfect way for me to contribute i started working through my stash of brown yarns to transform them into turkey legs and wrote this pattern in the process i hope you enjoy making this pattern and consider it as inspiration to make a contribution to your own community in whatever way feels right to you
